title: Negative supply shocks the source of stagflation

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains how an economy could simultaneously experience high inflation and high unemployment?

choices.label: The government increases spending without increasing taxes.
The government increases taxes without increasing spending.
Women and teenagers stay out of the labor force.
Negative supply shocks cause factor prices to increase.
